name: MaxTite 70% Isopropyl Alcohol (1 Gallon (4 Pack, 32 fl oz) - Includes Heavy-Duty Spray Nozzle - Made in USA
short_description: Perfect Balance between Effectiveness and Safety: Lower 70% concentration offers enhanced penetration for thorough cleaning, yet remains less aggressive than higher concentrations—ideal for ensuring prolonged contact without compromising sensitive materials or surfaces.

Supports Multifaceted DIY Projects: Our rubbing alcohol extends its utility beyond traditional uses, serving as a key ingredient for crafting personal or professional cosmetics, soaps, perfumes, skin and hair solutions, lacquers, dyes, streak-free window cleaners, and a multitude of other applications, inspiring creativity across diverse projects

Effectively Cleans Surfaces: Our 70% Isopropyl alcohol provides a thorough cleaning for hard surfaces such as countertops, doorknobs, and electronics, supporting hygiene and cleanliness against common contaminants.
Removes Adhesive Residue: Isopropyl alcohol can dissolve many types of sticky substances, like tape residue or sticker adhesive, making it useful for cleaning surfaces without damaging them.

Heavy Duty Sprayer—Our versatile dispensing solution offers an adjustable nozzle for customized mist or jet stream application. Built to endure rigorous use, this heavy-duty sprayer ensures reliable performance across various industries

Technical Grade - Our 70% isopropyl alcohol in technical grade offers a high-purity solution tailored for industrial and technical applications. Perfect for manufacturing, cleaning, and various industrial processes, this grade ensures consistent quality and efficacy, meeting the demands of diverse technical uses
Reduced Plastic Footprint: Opt for our updated packaging, now utilizing 25% less plastic, to make a positive environmental choice without compromising product quality.
